value.title: Chill Zerg Gameplay | Trying to play aggressively vs Terran
value.excerpt: #ZergVsTerran #Starcraft2 #Gameplay #Commentary In today's video we're doing some chill zerg gameplay and we're going to be playing very aggressively. value.title: StarCraft 2: How-to Baneling Bust INTELLIGENTLY! (Guide)
value.excerpt: Baneling Busting is one of the easiest Zerg all-ins in the game. Most Zerg players are aware of this strategy and realise that it works great on the lower part of the ladder in Zerg versus Terran, Zerg versus Protoss and Zerg versus Zerg.
